peterborough-contest

Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Tout Hill, Peterborough Sources: http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc37.htm Northampton Mercury, 10th September 1859
Open to all amateur bands throughout England.
Prizes: £15, £8, £4, £2, £1
The advertisment for the contest states "the nervous are particularly invited to be present" !
